🕐 Time: {{ $json.meeting_time }}

parameters.subject: =AI Operations Platform — Built for {{ $json.company }}
parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $json.name }},

Thanks for taking the call! As promised, here's a quick overview of what we do.

The Problem We Solve

Security companies lose $150K–$300K/year on manual dispatch operations — slow shift filling, missed calls, overtime bleed, and compliance gaps.

What Our AI Platform Does

Shift Fulfillment AIFills open shifts in <5 min via automated waterfall calling
24/7 AI ReceptionistAnswers every inbound call, qualifies leads, books meetings
Guard Safety ChecksAutomated hourly check-ins for lone workers (OHS compliant)
Smart SchedulingAI confirms availability, handles call-in sick, updates systems

Results

  • ⚡ Shift fill time: 45 min → under 5 min
  • 📞 Inbound answer rate: 100% (24/7)
  • 💰 $150K–$300K saved annually
  • 📊 90%+ fill rate without human intervention

Want to see it in action? Reply to this email and we'll set up a quick 20-minute live demo.

Best,
Sophia — AI Operations Specialist
SecurityAI Platform

parameters.subject: =Following up — AI for {{ $json.company }} Operations
parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $json.name }},

Thanks for your time on the call. As mentioned, I'll follow up at a better time.

In the meantime, here's a quick summary:

We help security companies automate shift filling (45 min → 5 min), handle inbound calls 24/7 with AI, and save $150K-$300K/year in operational costs.

When you're ready for a quick 20-minute demo, just reply to this email.

Best,
Sophia — AI Operations Specialist

parameters.responseBody: ={ "results": [{ "result": "Email sent successfully to {{ $json.email }}. The prospect will receive the email shortly." }] }

parameters.content:
## SecurityAI — Vapi Sales Follow-up Workflow

**What this does:**
1. Receives tool call from Vapi AI agent (Sophia) during live call
2. Routes based on action type (meeting/info/callback)
3. Sends professional HTML email instantly
4. **If meeting booked**: AI parses date/time into ISO format
5. Logs everything to Google Sheet
6. Responds to Vapi so Sophia can confirm

**TODO**: Add Google Calendar node after "AI Parse DateTime" (needs credential in UI)

**Webhook URL:** `https://n8n.aiwithdhruv.cloud/webhook/vapi-sales-followup`
